Azat is a member of the Technology Fellows program at Capital One Financial Corporation. This program is "your technical co-founder" or CTO-as-a-service partnership for projects within Capital One. Tech Fellows Program is modeled after IBM Fellows and Google Fellows and it server the following functions:* Work with senior leadership on strategic technical decisions and directions* Mentor and teach Capital One associates * Provide vision and insights into new technologies while helping implement them at scale* Expand open source contribution and consumption* Model a career path that enables technical individual contributors to continue to grow in technical expertise* Work on product to ensure the right application of cutting-edge technologies* Create interactive self-led courses on general technologies and company-specific knowledge* Represent Capital One at technology conferences* Promote Capital One as the technology company* Write publications on intranet and external Capital One blogs* Help Capital One with recruiting of the best tech talent* Represent the company at tech conference by delivering talks of the industry best practices and advanced solutions* Grow the community and company culture* Participate and organize mentorship events, trainings and hackathons.At Capital One®, we think big and do big things. We were the first company to develop and offer mass customization and personalization of credit card products, and we’ve been innovating relentlessly ever since. Today, we are a nationally recognized brand, a top-ten bank, and a scientific laboratory on a journey to become a leading high-tech company and digital innovator touching more than 65 million customer accounts. At Capital One, we dare to dream, disrupt, and deliver a better way for our customers, the financial industry, and for each other. Capital One—Change banking for good.https://www.yahoo.com/tech/s/capital-ones-real-product-software-203829520.html
Created curriculum for in-person live and online training in Node.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, React.js and Express.js. Produced both types of trainings.http://node.universityhttp://nodeprogram.com
Author React Quickly book with Manning Publications on React.js and React Native libraries for building User Interfaces and applications.http://reactquickly.co

Run daily scrum meetings for the Growth hacking team/initiative at DocuSign, perform software engineering duties, estimate tasks, conduct A/B testing, improve user engagement, retention and sign up rates.Report directly to the Director of Web Engineering and Product Development, and work closely with the VP of Product Management.#growthhackingDocuSign® is the Electronic Transaction & Signature Management leader and global standard for signing anything, anytime, anywhere, on any device. We have enabled over 60 million users to DocuSign more than 290 million documents in 188 countries and 48 languages around the world, while adding 50,000 new users every day. “DocuSign” is well on its way to becoming a verb and a household name.
Practical Node.js: Building Real-World Scalable Web Apps is your step-by-step guide to learning how to build a wide range of Node.js web applications using a professional development toolkit.

recommendations: Robin Kuehn
Software Engineer
December 5, 2017, Robin worked with Azat in different groups

Azat is very knowledgeable about Node, React, and React-Native. Beyond just knowing about these technologies, he is an excellent teacher and is willing to spend time sharing his knowledge. I helped TA one of his React-Native courses and saw how he expertly explained core principles before making a deep dive into very specific details of React-Native. By the end of the two day course, the engineers who knew nothing about React-Native had developed an app for ios and android; it was pretty cool!

Staffing and Recruiting Sales Manager
October 9, 2017, Azat was a client of Timothy’s

Azat has been a game changer for me.  As a professional IT recruiter, it is imperative to have a clear understanding of the ever changing technologies that are both relevant and prevalent in the market.  Oddly, it is a fact that the technologies that are prevalent may not be relevant.  No fellow I have met is more capable and qualified than Azat at educating even a layman such as myself about the current state and future possibilities of technology as it grows in a variety of markets and industries throughout the world.

Worked with Azat at Capital One on an iOS/Apple Wallet proof-of-concept and was amazed at his speed and quality of delivery. Built an API in Node.js from scratch in a few days and an entire front-end in ReactJS a few days later, both meeting design requirements; this work would normally take several sprints and be spread out across a number of developers. In addition, provided leadership and expertise to younger developers on the team on decisions concerning architecture and AWS infrastructure. Thank you Azat!

summary: Azat Mardan taught over 1,000 software engineers in-person and even more online, by books and video. He published 14+ books and dozens online courses. He has over 15+ years of experience in web, mobile and software development. With a Bachelor’s Degree in Informatics and a Master of Science in Information Systems Technology degree, Azat possesses deep academic knowledge as well as extensive practical experience.Currently, Azat works as a Technology Fellow at Capital One Financial Corporation. Here's a good article about Capital One, a technology company: https://www.yahoo.com/tech/s/capital-ones-real-product-software-203829520.html.In his spare time, he writes about technology on his blog: webAppLog.com which is number one in “express.js tutorial” Google search results. Azat is also the author of Practical Node.js, Pro Express.js, Express.js Guide, Rapid Prototyping with JS and Oh My JS; and the creator of open-source Node.js projects, including ExpressWorks, mongoui and HackHall.Books written by Azat Mardan:* React Quickly [Manning, 2017]* React Native Quickly: Start Learning Native iOS Development with JavaScript* Full Stack JavaScript: Learn Backbone.js, Node.js and MongoDB [Apress, 2015]* Practical Node.js: Building Scalable Real-World Web Apps [Apress, 2014]* Pro Express.js: Master Express.js—The Node.js Framework For Your Web Development [Apress, 2014]* Express.js Deep API Reference [Apress, 2014]* ProgWriter [programmer + writer]: Lessons learned on my path from ordinary developer to writer of multiple programming books—that sell* ProgWriter 2.0: Beyond Books: SECRETS of a successful online course creator and other INCOME strategies that REALLY work* Introduction to OAuth with Node.js* Express.js Guide* Rapid Prototyping with JS* JavaScript and Node FUNdamentals* Oh My JS* 5 Hacks to Getting the Job of Your Dreams to Live a Happier and Healthier LifeAzat's lifelong goal is to ship code that matters.
name: Azat Mardan
title: Tech Fellow at Capital One | Book Author | Public Speaker
